tasks.name: Add regex pattern to extract @agent:name from thread headers
tasks.report: Added THREAD_HEADER_REGEX pattern to extract @agent:name from thread headers

tasks.name: Update parseTasksMd() to return assigned_agent per thread
tasks.report: Updated parseTasksMd() to extract assigned_agent from thread headers using THREAD_HEADER_REGEX and apply it to all tasks in that thread

tasks.name: Update generateTasksMdFromPlan() to include agent placeholder syntax
tasks.report: Updated generateTasksMdFromPlan() to include @agent: placeholder in thread headers for agent assignment

tasks.name: Update generateTasksMdFromTasks() to include existing agent assignments
tasks.report: Updated generateTasksMdFromTasks() to track and include existing @agent:name assignments from tasks in thread headers

tasks.name: Update serializeTasksMd() to apply thread agent to all tasks in thread
tasks.report: Added serializeTasksMd() function that parses TASKS.md content to extract thread-level @agent: assignments and applies them to all tasks in each thread

tasks.name: Add unit tests for agent assignment parsing and generation
tasks.report: Added 10 unit tests for agent assignment: parsing @agent:name from headers, generating with/without agents, serializeTasksMd() function, round trip preservation, empty placeholder handling

tasks.name: Add ParsedThread type with assigned_agent field
tasks.report: Added ParsedThread interface to types.ts with id, name, and optional assigned_agent field

tasks.name: Update TasksMdParseResult type to include thread-level agent info
tasks.report: Added TasksMdParseResult interface with tasks, threads (ParsedThread[]), and errors fields

tasks.name: Export new types from index.ts
tasks.report: Types auto-exported via 'export * from ./lib/types.ts' in index.ts - no changes needed

tasks.name: Update work agents CLI to use loadAgentsYaml() instead of loadAgents()
tasks.report: Updated agents CLI to use loadAgentsConfig() from agents-yaml.ts instead of AGENTS.md functions

tasks.name: Format agent output with name, description, best_for, and models list
tasks.report: Formatted output with name, description, best_for, and models list (with variant support)

tasks.name: Add --json flag for machine-readable output
tasks.report: Added --json flag for machine-readable output with normalized model specs

tasks.name: Handle missing agents.yaml gracefully with helpful error message
tasks.report: Added helpful error message when agents.yaml is missing, with example config and init suggestion

tasks.name: Add unit tests for new agents command output
tasks.report: Added tests/agents-cli.test.ts with 8 tests covering: human-readable output, JSON output, missing file handling, empty agents list, and argument parsing

tasks.name: Remove --add flag implementation from agents CLI
tasks.report: Removed --add flag and related options (--name, --description, --best-for, --model) from CLI. Added deprecation errors for these flags.

tasks.name: Remove --remove flag implementation from agents CLI
tasks.report: Removed --remove flag handler from CLI main function. Added deprecation error when flag is used.

tasks.name: Remove AGENTS.md file operations from src/lib/agents.ts
tasks.report: Removed AGENTS.md file operations (parseAgentsMd, generateAgentsMd, saveAgentsConfig, addAgent, removeAgent, getAgentsMdPath). Kept isValidModelFormat as it's used by agents-yaml.ts.

tasks.name: Update any imports that reference AGENTS.md functions
tasks.report: Updated multi-navigator.ts and assign.ts to use loadAgentsConfig/getAgentYaml from agents-yaml.ts instead of deprecated functions.

tasks.name: Keep agents.ts file but mark functions as deprecated with comments
tasks.report: Marked getAgentsConfig, listAgents, getAgent as deprecated with @deprecated JSDoc comments and runtime console.warn messages. Updated tests to verify deprecation warnings.

tasks.name: Import generateTasksMd function in approve.ts CLI
tasks.report: Added imports for generateTasksMdFromPlan, parseStreamDocument, fs functions, path, getWorkDir, and atomicWriteFile to approve.ts

tasks.name: Add TASKS.md generation call after successful plan approval
tasks.report: Added generateTasksMdAfterApproval helper function and integrated it into handlePlanApproval flow

tasks.name: Check for existing TASKS.md and warn if overwriting
tasks.report: Helper function checks for existing TASKS.md and returns overwritten flag, CLI outputs warning when overwriting

tasks.name: Update success message to indicate TASKS.md was generated
tasks.report: Updated success message to show TASKS.md path and overwrite warning when applicable

tasks.name: Handle generation failure gracefully (approve plan, warn about TASKS.md)
tasks.report: Generation failure returns error in result, plan still approved, warning shown to user instead of failure

tasks.name: Add integration test for plan approval with auto-generation
tasks.report: Added 4 integration tests to approval_flow.test.ts covering: TASKS.md generation on approval, overwrite warning, graceful failure handling, and JSON output format
